api_list.name: fetchCarByVIN
api_list.description: Will fetch only single car by vin in JSON format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://automobileapi1.p.rapidapi.com/automobile/cars/101"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automobileapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://automobileapi1.p.rapidapi.com/automobile/cars/{vin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automobileapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
